summary: Stan and Ollie get involved with con men, crooks, a genial magician, and two interchangeable coffins with disastrous but funny results.
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Dante|Sheila Ryan|John Shelton|Don Costello|Elisha Cook Jr.|Edward Gargan|Addison Richards|George Lynn|James Bush|Lou Lubin|Robert Emmett Keane|Richard Lane|Willie Best|Harry Blackstone|Wade Boteler|Buz Buckley|Roland Carpenter|Harry Carter|Violet Church|Les Clark|Edgar Dearing|Barry Downing|Tom Dugan|Ralph Dunn|Frank Faylen|Mildred Gaye|Bud Geary|Mary Lou Harrington|Paul Kruger|Wilbur Mack|Terry Moore|Mantan Moreland|Margaret Roach|Walter Sande|Leon Tyler|Eddy Waller
director: Director: Alfred L. Werker (as Alfred Werker)
title: ¡Qué par de locos!
